statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (15,-13) and (8,3).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

solution.p: \displaystyle\frac{{{3}-{\left(-{13}\right)}}}{{{8}-{\left({15}\right)}}}=\frac{{16}}{{-{{7}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{16}}{{7}} (if it's not already reduced)
